Title: Allows bars and restaurants to organize and manage sports squares pools
Summary: Allows bars and restaurants to organize and manage sports squares pools, provided that they do not take any profit from such pools.
LawSection: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law, in relation to allowing bars and restaurants to organize and manage sports squares pools
